name: Falling Torture
description:
A falling game.

A cursed guy falling for ever and burning Trying to reach an end but never manage to get to the true end.

Avoiding everithing exept:

1. The Yellow Cyrcles Witch will encrease the speed,

2. The green squers that will bounce you up

3. And the pick squer at the end (is it the end?)

The goal Is simple just reach the Pink Squere.
